description: OrbitSignal â€“ TypeScript/Vite project using a selected set of Coinbase SDKs.

@coinbase/onchainkit.why: Base-first UI helpers and utilities for building onchain-enabled interfaces.

@coinbase/wallet-sdk.why: Integration and lifecycle management for Coinbase Wallet connections.

@coinbase/x402.why: HTTP-native x402 payment flow for gated or payable endpoints.

@coinbase/agentkit.why: Toolkit for agent-style and automated onchain interactions.

@coinbase/cdp-sdk.why: SDK for interacting with Coinbase Developer Platform services.
